entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Pitt Meadows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:14 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pitt Meadows 8:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: 4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 4.0°C
Wind: SE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers at times heavy. Temperature rising to 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers changing to rain at times heavy after midnight. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to 11 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
